title: Explain to me...
body:
How and why Caitlin can do 2225 true damage with her Auto's as well as 1273 Physical damage.

That much true damage on a ult is still bs let alone on auto attacks.
so how does this happen? Her items do no true damage, none of her abilities do, neither kat or malphite have any ally true damage AA buffs, she didn't even have red buff.

so how?

replies.body:
They made her passive make her ignore 50% of the targets bonus armor so if you were a tank (U tanked like 3.5K damage so I'm guessing u were) with like 200 bonus armor or so - I'm guessing that's all the damage that cut through your armor - and the rest is the amount that was on the other 50% of the scale and ignored partially by non bonus armor (You probably had like 90 armor which ignores like 48% damage so that cuts her attacks but her attacks ignoring what I guess was like 200-300 armor would have been ignoring like 100-200 armor for that portion of the attack calculation so figure that's why it was displayed as being so much "true" damage.

Kats Voracity does dmg tho lamaokai.

> [{quoted}](name=Level1Pentakill,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Vjl5BQ0N,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-13T02:12:59.768+0000)
>
> They made her passive make her ignore 50% of the targets bonus armor so if you were a tank (U tanked like 3.5K damage so I'm guessing u were) with like 200 bonus armor or so - I'm guessing that's all the damage that cut through your armor - and the rest is the amount that was on the other 50% of the scale and ignored partially by non bonus armor (You probably had like 90 armor which ignores like 48% damage so that cuts her attacks but her attacks ignoring what I guess was like 200-300 armor would have been ignoring like 100-200 armor for that portion of the attack calculation so figure that's why it was displayed as being so much "true" damage.
> 
> Kats Voracity does dmg tho lamaokai.

Also add on Last Whisper to make it 85%?
Nah it's only "bonus" armor not base armor that her passive ignores while LW ignores a % of all armor.

> [{quoted}](name=Level1Pentakill,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Vjl5BQ0N,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2015-10-13T03:22:58.600+0000)
>
> Nah it's only "bonus" armor not base armor that her passive ignores while LW ignores a % of all armor.

Yeah I misread that.

No but I mean for damage calculations it probably lists the damage through armor from her passive (ignores 50% of bonus armor) as true damage even though it's technically physical - to give you an idea of how much armor she's cutting through (which is sorta the point of death recap, to check damage types etc) and is a good way of showing you how much her passive is doing so you can possibly work around it or w/e or be aware of it in that game or in the future.

It should still count as physical damage tho?
and the damage from her passive is separately listed in the death recap as physical damage.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Vjl5BQ0N,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-10-13T02:40:14.097+0000)
>
> It should still count as physical damage tho?

What champion were you playing?
